title: Slate Money: COVID-19: April 1, 2020
description:
Every Wednesday, the Slate Money hosts discuss what’s going on right now amid the COVID-19 pandemic. 
Today, Emily, Anna, and Felix discuss the question of paying rent and mortgages amid the massive layoffs due to COVID-19.
Email: slatemoney@slate.com
Podcast production by Jessamine Molli. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
